title: TremoloSoundEffect
content:

name: TremoloSoundEffect
type: class
memorycategory: Instances
summary: |
  Creates a trembling effect on a sound by varying the volume of the sound up
  and down.
description: |
  The TremoloSoundEffect creates a trembling effect on a sound by varying the
  volume of the sound up and down.

  Like all other Class.SoundEffect|SoundEffects, a TremoloSoundEffect can be
  applied either to a Class.Sound or Class.SoundGroup by being parented to
  either.
codesamples: []
inherits:
  - SoundEffect
descendants: []
tags: []
deprecationmessage: ''
properties:
  - name: TremoloSoundEffect.Depth
    summary: |
      Controls how much the volume will raise and lower.
    description: |
      Range: 0 to 1 (default 1) Controls how much the volume will raise and
      lower. This value ranges between 0 (minimum volume) and 1 (maximum
      volume). If set to its minimum, the volume will not oscillate at all.
    codesamples: []
    type: float
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: State
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities:
      - LegacySound
  - name: TremoloSoundEffect.Duty
    summary: |
      Controls how long during one volume oscillation the effect will be active.
    description: |
      Range: 0 to 1 (default 0.5) Controls how long during one volume
      oscillation the effect will be active, specifically what percentage
      between 0 (0%) and 1 (100%).
    codesamples: []
    type: float
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: State
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities:
      - LegacySound
  - name: TremoloSoundEffect.Frequency
    summary: |
      Sets how often the effect will oscillate the volume.
    description: |
      Range: 0.1 to 20 (default 5) Sets how often the effect will oscillate the
      volume. Measured in Hz.
    codesamples: []
    type: float
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: State
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities:
      - LegacySound
